name: fireshare
tagline: A self-hosted video sharing platform with previews and privacy controls
description: Fireshare is a self-hosted video sharing and thumbnailing platform that auto-generates preview GIFs for faster browsing. Ideal for sharing short clips or highlights internally with minimal setup and media privacy.

features.title: File Sharing Server
features.description: Share files through a web-based interface

features.title: Upload and Download
features.description: Upload files and provide download access via the browser

features.title: Expiring Files
features.description: Automatically remove shared files after a configured time

features.title: Access Limits
features.description: Restrict downloads based on count or expiration rules

features.title: Simple Web Interface
features.description: Use a minimal UI for file sharing operations

features.title: Metadata Display
features.description: Show file size and upload information to users
